title: Login page not responsive on mobile devices
description: The login page layout breaks when viewed on smartphones. Buttons and input fields overlap making it unusable.

title: API rate limiting not working as expected
description: Current rate limiting allows more requests than specified in the documentation. This could lead to server overload.

title: Add dark mode support
description: Implement a dark mode option for better user experience in low-light environments and to reduce eye strain.

title: Security vulnerability in password reset function
description: The current password reset mechanism is vulnerable to timing attacks. We need to implement a more secure method.

title: Optimize database queries for faster load times
description: Several pages are loading slowly due to inefficient database queries. We need to review and optimize these for better performance.
